headline: Analysts Maintain Hold Rating on PepsiCo (PEP)
summary: PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) is one of the 10 Best Stocks to Buy According to Elliott Investment Management. On February 20, 2026, Wells Fargo analyst Christopher Carey maintained a Hold rating on PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) with a price target of $165. The stock also saw its Hold rating from TD Cowen reiterated on February 20 by […]

headline: PepsiCo (PEP) Valuation Check As Price Cuts, US$15b Brand Refresh And US$10b Buyback Reset Growth Plans
summary: PepsiCo (PEP) just rolled out a broad reset of its snacks and beverages portfolio, cutting prices on key brands, launching a US$15b brand refresh and authorizing a new US$10b share buyback program. See our latest analysis for PepsiCo. The reset comes after a strong run in the shares, with a 30 day share price return of 10.49% and a year to date share price return of 19.34%. The 5 year total shareholder return of 47.69% points to gains that have built up gradually rather than in a straight...
